tasks.task: Drive a forklift into a truck
subtasks: Sit in the forklift seat
Engage the forklift's steering
Drive the forklift towards the truck
Align the forklift with the truck's bed

tasks.task: Lift a bag onto the truck using the forklift
subtasks: Position the forklift tines beneath the bag
Activate the forklift's lift mechanism
Raise the bag to place it into the truck bed

tasks.task: Adjust the bag placement in the truck bed
subtasks: Guide the bag as it is lowered into the truck
Ensure the bag is seated properly in the truck bed

tasks.task: Secure the bag in the truck bed
subtasks: Find a suitable rope or tie-down
Coil the rope or tie-down if necessary
Walk to the front of the truck
Measure the distance to the bag to estimate rope length
Walk to the rear of the truck and reach over the bed
Attach the rope to the bag
Walk back to the front to reattach the other end
If unsuccessful, return to the rear to adjust
Confirm the bag is securely fastened
Inspect the loaded bag for stability
Check the rope or tie-down tightness
Verify the forklift's condition for the next load
